color_properties.intro: Each sentence uses a different RGB percentage value and should be rendered in that specified color.
color_properties.red_percent: This text is red by assigning a percentage for the RGB values (100%, 0%, 0%)
color_properties.orange_percent: This text is orange by assigning a percentage for the RGB values (100%, 40%, 0%)
color_properties.green_percent: This text is green by assigning a percentage for the RGB values (0%, 100%, 0%)
color_properties.blue_percent: This text is blue by assigning a percentage for the RGB values (0%, 0%, 100%)
color_properties.purple_percent: This text is purple by assigning a percentage for the RGB values (50%, 0%, 50%)
color_properties.gray_percent: This text is gray by assigning a percentage for the RGB values (50%, 50%, 50%)
